Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2008 01:20PM - edited Aug 28, 2008 01:21PM by Joellefjmtdm OMG my symptoms are kinda close.....I get my yearly exam and also do self breast exam every now and then.  I had my last check up a week ago when my doctor noticed a lump in my left breast.  It is round and almost exact size to a small marble.  My breast have been sore for a couple of weeks now, and my left nipple has been partially inward but that accured as soon as i had my child almost 2 years ago and i thought it was from that, not so sure now.  Im freaking out because all the research I have done online are giving me aswers pointing to inflammatory breast cancer and from what i know that is not good. My mammogram appointment is not until Sept 15th.  I'm 33 and scared....any suggestions????
